body.name: LEVOIT Cordless Vacuum Cleaner with Mini Brush for Pet Cleaning, Stick Vac Auto Mode, Bendable Design, Powerful Suction Hard-floors, Carpets, 4-Stage HEPA Filter, 40 Minutes Runtime, IQ40
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 18 hrs 40 mins
features: Mini Pet Motorized Brush: Perfect for cleaning pet dander from carpet, sofas, beds, and plush toys.

Intelligent Auto Mode: This cordless stick vacuum uses Dynamic Power Control (DPC) Technology to automatically adjust the suction power based on the level of debris detected by the infrared sensor, eliminating guesswork and optimizing runtime

Deep Clean All Floors: With a 100,000 RPM brushless motor and VortexAir Technology, this vacuum generates 130AW / 23kPa suction power. Efficiently clean dust, litter, and large debris from carpet and hard flooring instead of pushing them forward
Bendable Design: This vacuum cleaner’s ergonomic, bendable design allows you to easily clean tight corners beneath tables and furniture without bending over
Long Runtime: Vacuum for up to 40 minutes on power level 1 or purchase an additional battery to boost your total runtime to 80 minutes when you switch them out
99.99% Filtration: Filter 99.99% of 0.3-micron particles with 4-stage, Dual-HEPA filtration, which helps release filtered air
Batteries & Filters: Search B09V25N874 to find official Levoit VortexIQ 40 vacuum replacement filters. Search B09V1DMX2G to find official Levoit VortexIQ 40 vacuum replacement batteries

NOTE: 1.Do not force or over-extend the flex stick past 90°.This may cause permanent damage. 2.Do not lift when flex stick collision on furniture. 3.Do not hit the obstacles hard when using the flex stick

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2022
reviews.reviewText: This vac has surpassed all of my expectations. Suction power is great. I rarely have to go up to higher level. Base level of suction works great on sand, dirt, dust, dog hair, etc...It will adjust power automatically if an area has more dirt. It maneuvers effortlessly over the floors. I have only a couple short pile area rugs and this cleans them well and fluffs up the pile. My rugs look almost new after using this! It's amazing how much fine dirt/sand this pics up. Much improved over my old vac. It works like a dream on all my bare wood floors and easily gets around and under all my furniture. The lights really help to see pet hair and other debris hiding in dark places and corners. Side suction is outstanding along baseboards. The telescoping duster works great for cobwebs on the ceiling, dusting ceiling fan blades and light fixtures. The trigger stays on unless you squeeze it again to turn it off....unlike pricier vacs that makes you squeeze the trigger the whole time. The vac is not heavy ( I believe it states around 6 lbs) but it takes a bit of getting used to this type of stick vac where all the weight is at the top. At first feels a bit unwieldy but you will soon get used to using it. You do feel it in your arm after a bit and I often switch hands in order to get a balanced arm workout, lol. The wheels and swivel of the head make it SO easy to vac!Emptying the dust cup is a cinch with the push of a button over the trash can. The cup is small, but so simple to empty one handed that it isn't a big deal. All of the attachments click on and off easily. The included attachments are great.Because it is top heavy, it will NOT stand on it's own. You must store securely held on wall charger base resting on floor. If you don't want to install wall charger, you can snap it apart to store top ( motor) , stick and head on a shelf. The wheels roll VERY easily so just propping it up, especially on a smooth surface, won't work. It will roll and the top will come crashing down on floor.Battery power is impressive and I was able to vac all the floors in our 2k s.f. home on a single charge. It charges back up quickly as well.Having a true HEPA system of 2 filters ( washable) helps to keep dust where it belongs...not blowing back out all over your home. Breaking down the vac to rinse filters is also a cinch. The whole set up is simple, intuitive and high quality.I highly recommend this vac. I've wanted a cordless stick that would work well daily to suck up all the German shepherd fur blowing around our wood floors. If you have bare floors, this works great and doesn't scratch them. So easy and actually fun to use every day. Very happy with this ( and not having to pay $800 for it!) and I'm hoping it lasts a LONG time.Also, I need to mention how quiet this vac is! The dog doesn't go into another room anymore. Nice!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 20, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars AMAZING LITTLE VACUUM
reviews.reviewText: First of all, this is not a "bought" review!! Just ordinary folks that are very impressed with this product.We bought a PrettyCare cordless vac, the reviews were okay so we took a chance...we're sorry we did. I won't go into it here but don't buy one.We decided on the Levoit from other reviews and being a known name. We opted for the package deal with extra battery and filters. It came fast! Unboxing was straightforward, well packaged and nothing broken or missing. We were impressed with the overall appearance and quality of the vacuum and accessories. Everything fits together nicely. First thing was to charge both batteries, charge time was just a couple of hours per battery.Using this vacuum was very impressive to say the least. Our floors are the LVP "wood" flooring, one 7'x10' area rug and several small bath mats. Our dog is a Pitt/Queensland Heeler mix, not a bad shedder but he does lose some hair. The swamp cooler leaves a fine white particle on the bare floor that is hard to sweep. This vacuum picked up every bit and even cleaned the joints of the floor...all on the "auto" setting which was low. Amazing!! The dog hair was a breeze for this vacuum! The large area rug was clean in no time still on the "auto" setting. You can hear the suction automatically pick up in areas with a little more hair/debris but goes back to low on less dirty areas! The "intelligent" feature of this vacuum really does work!! Being that the beater head of this vacuum is electric powered it does not excessively drain the battery when left in the "auto" mode. The edge cleaning capability of the beater head is just as good, if not better than most upright vacuums!!Overall this is one very awesome cordless vacuum for the money!!! You could spend more but why! You could spend less but i wouldnt! Would I recommend this vacuum to anyone...ABSOLUTELY!!! Would we buy another one if it was ever needed...ABSOLUTELY!!!If you need a small cordless vacuum for everyday cleaning regardless of floor type I don't believe you can get a better vacuum for even twice the price!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great value and performance
reviews.reviewText: Vacuum is a bit heavy after some use, the battery isn't impressive, removing the small dust container often creates a small mess, the ergonomics of the handheld unit isn't all there, but it sucks. It sucks so much it captures more than I expect it to. Owner of 4 hairy pets and it does an excellent job at getting rid of fur and the dust it brings, as good, if not better, than other high end cordless. I would say the vacuum brush feature on this vacuum rivals corded ones. The LEDs are a life saver because it does an excellent job at spotting fur. However, it is puzzling how the variant of this product to include the pet brush adds nearly 80 more dollars than what I paid for the base model, with no way to purchase separately. That's a brand new battery for this vacuum. The vacuum brush is good enough for pet owners, just irksome in some situations. Gets the job done right in a portable form factor for a competitive price.

Not much to like here....The vac came in a box that had opened by a previous buyer. No manual was provided. When the power is turned off, some of the material picked up falls back out the bottom onto the floor. Additionally, the roller on the bottom tends to become disengaged. This was clearly a unit that had been returned for some reason. The sale price was approx. $140 and it probably is not worth that. However, returning it isn't worth the inconvenience to me.Overall, it is not up to the high standard of service and product I have grown to expect through my previous shopping with Amazon.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the Netherlands on October 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Tot nu toe heel tevreden met deze stofzuiger. Door de automatisch roterende borstel wordt het vuil makkelijk opgezogen, ook kan de stofzuiger hierdoor op een lagere kracht (automatische stand) werken.Het is wel zaak om regelmatig het reservoir leeg te maken. Ook zal je regelmatig de roterende borstel schoon moeten maken, maar deze is er gemakkelijk uit te halen.Grotere stukken vuil zoals b.v. papier of plastic kan je beter niet opzuigen omdat hierdoor de borstel of stang nogal snel verstopt van kan raken, de doorvoer hiervan is namelijk smaller als bij reguliere stofzuigers.Apparaat zelf oogt en voelt degelijk, de tijd zal het moeten uitwijzen of dit ook zo is.De winst voor ons zit hem er vooral in dat de stofzuiger veel handzamer is dan een reguliere stofzuiger en je hem veel makkelijker en sneller pakt om snel even te stofzuigen wanneer dat nodig is.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on September 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Have now been using this six days a week for 9 months. It was bought specifically as a daily dog hair collector, a job which it has carried out admirably on both carpet and hard floors without any noticeable effect on battery performance. In my opinion it would not replace a standard vacuum cleaner, which we use on the 7th day of the week, but is ideally suited to its role. I therefore give it 4 stars plus one for outstanding customer service - I was recently a little clumsy with it (impatient old age) and it broke at the junction where it folds to go under furniture etc. I could not source a spare "stick" online so emailed customer service on a Sunday. I duly received a reply on the Monday and received a replacement "stick" on the Wednesday morning, no questions asked and no charge. 10/10 for that, what more could you ask ?NB. You do need to maintain it regularly for best performance

Ich war mit meinem Sauger ( Markengerät lnapp 400,00Euro) sehr unzufrieden und bin dann auf diesen Sauger gestoßen. Meine Wohnung 45qm, viel Staub durch Bodenheizung und ich habe eine Katze. Ich dachte, für den Preis wird er ok sein. Als er ankam..großes Erstaunen. Viel Zubehör und alles macht einen wertigen Eindruck. Schnell zusammengebaut. Sauger an und ich bin echt begeistert. Saugleistung ist sehr gut, durch das Licht wird Staub sichtbar gemacht. Führung auch super leicht. Bedienung einfach. Bei Leerung muss etwas mit der Hand oder Bürste nachgeholfen werden, es bleibt immer etwas hängen. Behälter ist schnell auseinander, sauber gemacht und wieder zusammengebaut. Die Knicktechnik super, jetzt komme ich leicht unter Schränke, Sofa und Bett. Vorsichtshalber hatte ich meinen alten Sauger noch behalten. Mittlerweile habe ich ihn aber weiter gegeben. Der Levoit Staubsauger hat meine Erwartungen erfüllt und ich bin begeistert. Das Saugen macht damit echt Spaß und die Lautstärke ist so leise, daß meine Katze nicht unter das Bett flüchtet. Eine Bekannte war so begeistert, daß sie direkt so einen Sauger gekauft hat. Hier stimmt wirklich alles. Mega Staubsauger mit einer super Preis Leistung. Würde ihn jederzeit wieder kaufen und kann ihn weiterempfehlen.

Questo acquisto è la diretta conseguenza di un lungo approfondimento sulle recensioni.Spero con la mia di contribuire alle future valutazioni.Di aspirapolvere senza fili ne esistono una quantità infinita. Quasi tutti guardano come riferimento al Dyson e valutazioni e paragoni sono conseguenti alla ottima fama di quest'ultimo. Questo credo sia un errore, non sempre ad un prezzo elevato corrisponde qualità assoluta senza punti deboli. Inoltre chi costruisce un aspirapolvere, sapendo di doversi paragonare al più blasonato, cerca di migliorare o eliminare i difetti del concorrente.Pertanto ho cercato di valutare il mio acquisto riferendomi a questi punti fermi. In generale le principali caratteristiche che vengono richieste ad un buon aspirapolvere senza fili sono :Grande potenza di aspirazione ;buona durata della batteria ;Qualità dei materiali ;Leggerezza ;Buona dotazione accessori ;Questa marca e questo modello contemplano quasi tutte queste caratteristiche.Buona la potenza paria a 21,5 kPa, regolabile, dell'aspirazione. Inoltre è possibile selezionare la potenza di aspirazione in modalità "automatica". Aspira tutto quello che trova sulla sua strada e si nota immediatamente all'interno dell'apposito scomparto facilmente svuotabile. Le 6 luci led, alla base della scopa facilitano questo compito evidenziando polvere e sporco altrimenti invisibile.Sono rimasto perplesso sulla qualità della batteria. Il livello di carica(e ricarica) viene indicato da tre tacche luminose sulla stessa. La prima tacca si spegne quasi subito(2/3 minuti) indipendentemente dalla potenza utilizzata mentre le altre 2 e in particolare l'ultima durano più a lungo. In sostanza alla massima potenza la batteria dura 10/12 minuti. Mentre in modalità automatica o mixando tra le varie potenze, a secondo delle esigenze, siamo intorno ai 17/20 minuti. Per una appartamento di 120mq la batteria dura il giusto per effettuare una pulizia soddisfacente e senza dover tralasciare nulla. Vi segnalo che una batteria di riserva originale costa circa 80 euro e quindi, tranne esigenze particolari, una è sufficiente per un utilizzo ordinario. Da verificare, nei mesi a venire, la durata della batteria dopo numerosi utilizzi.I materiali per gli accessori(3) sono di plastica non eccessivamente corposa e sufficiente a non avere brutte sorprese, mentre il corpo macchina principale è ben solido. Buono lo snodo per poter pulire sotto i mobili o letti senza doversi chinare. E' possibile creare una "stazione " di ricarica appendendo la scopa, che altrimenti non sta in piedi da sola, e solo 2 dei 3 accessori in dotazione. In ogni caso la batteria si può sfilare e ricaricare dove si vuole con il ricaricatore in dotazione. Viene fornito con un 1 filtro hepa di ricambio che si può tranquillamente lavare ma si consiglia di sostituire dopo 6mesi. Come detto i 3 accessori consentono tutti i tipi pulizie necessarie in un appartamento ed in particolare la mini spazzola -certificata- per la rimozione di acari su superfici quali tappeti, divani, lenzuola e cuscini. Leggero quanto basta questo modello(‎VortexIQ 40 Flex) ha un motivo su tutti che ne CONSIGLIA L'ACQUISTO : NON è una cinesata, è prodotto in Europa credo in Inghilterra.Difatti, se prestate attenzione, tantissimi modelli presenti sul mercato in realtà sono tutti uguali, soprattutto quelli costruiti in Cina, cambia l'involucro ma la base comune è la stessa per tantissimi modelli.Ovviamente mi riservo di integrare la recensione tra qualche mese dopo aver verificato la durata nel tempo dell'intero prodotto.Da acquistare considerando anche le possibili offerte sul prezzo base.Doveroso Aggiornamento dopo 7 mesi di utilizzo :La batteria se utilizzata bene, ovvero caricata e scaricata ogni volta per intero, ha ampliato la sua durata a circa 30 minuti, più che sufficienti per la pulizia di un appartamento di oltre 120mq.Ma la cosa più importante, che è doveroso segnalare, la piena e assoluta disponibilità della casa madre per la sostituzione, in garanzia, del giunto snodabile che improvvisamente ha ceduto. Credo, inoltre ,che il ricambio sia già stato modificato in meglio onde evitare il ripresentarsi del problema.
